revision.text:
http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/|[http://www.foaf-project.org/ Friend Of A Friend] age|Type:Text Agent|Category depiction|Type:URL gender|Type:Text homepage|Type:URL knows|Type:Page mbox|Type:Email mbox_sha1sum|Type:Text member|Type:Text name|Type:Text Organization|Category Person|Category phone|Type:Text
[[Category:Vocabulary import]] [[Category:Foaf]]

[[Category:Template]]
__INDEX____NOTOC____NOEDITSECTION__
Welcome
This "sandbox" allows you to carry out experiments and to try your "Semantic MediaWiki" skills. If you are looking for information about Semantic MediaWiki, see [[Has Url::https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org]]. ''Please do not add material that is any way offensive, that is copyrighted, or that is at all libelous. Content added here will not stay permanently; this page is cleared regularly.'' A list of available extensions can be found [[Special:Version|here]].

revision.comment: Created page with "[[Has type::Text]] [[Has description::Simple descriptive explanatory text property.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]"
revision.text: [[Has type::Text]] [[Has description::Simple descriptive explanatory text property.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]

revision.comment: Created page with "The [[Has type::number]] of days it rains (on average) in one year. To be used in city pages. [[Category:sample pages]]"
revision.text: The [[Has type::number]] of days it rains (on average) in one year. To be used in city pages. [[Category:sample pages]]

revision.comment: Created page with "This attribute describes the [[Has type::Geographic coordinate|geographic coordinate]] of some place. [[Category:Sample pages]]"
revision.text:
This attribute describes the [[Has type::Geographic coordinate|geographic coordinate]] of some place.
[[Category:Sample pages]]
[[Has type::Number]] [[Category:Sample pages]]

[[Has type::Annotation URI]] [[Has description::A variant of datatype URL. It is used in cases where a URL property needs to be exported as an owl:AnnotationProperty]] which is the case almost exclusively for [[Property:Imported from|imported properties]]. [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
[[Has type::Boolean]] [[Has description::Attribute that can only have two possible values ("true" or "false", also 1/0, yes/no, t/f, and y/n).]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
[[Has type::Date]] [[Has description::Used for data values that represent points in time.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
[[Has type::Email]] [[Has description::Used for simple e-mail addresses.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
[[Has type::Number]] [[Has description::Used for property values that contain any kind of number, integer, decimal, and floating point numbers.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
[[Has type::Page]] [[Has description::Used for properties whose value is a page in the wiki. These display as a link and may not be longer than 255 characters.]][[Category:Lorem ipsum]]

[[Has type::Quantity]] [[Has description::Used for property values that describe quantities, in particular physical quantities such as time or distance.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
* [[Corresponds to::1 km²]] * [[Corresponds to::0.38610 sq mi]] * [[Corresponds to::1000 m²]] * [[Corresponds to::247.1054 acre]] * [[Corresponds to::988.4215 rood]]

[[Has type::Quantity]] [[Display units::kW]] [[Has description::Used for quantity property values that are displayed in kW but in support for several units.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
* [[Corresponds to::1 W, Watt, Watts]] * [[Corresponds to::0.001 kW]] * [[Corresponds to::0.0013410220 hp, bhp, horsepower]]

[[Has type::Text]] [[Has description::Used in combination with a special property to limit allowed values for this property.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
* [[Allows value::open]] * [[Allows value::closed]]
[[Has type::Telephone number]] [[Has description::Used for international telephone numbers that are to be stored in a standardized format.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]

[[Has type::Record]] [[Has fields::Has text; Has status]] [[Has description::Used for property values that consist of a short list of values of other datatypes where individual value are separated with semicolons (;).]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
[[Has type::Temperature]] [[Has description::Used for temperature values. Unlike other physical quantities, temperature is specified as special quantity type.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
[[Has type::Text]] [[Has description::Used to store strings of arbitrary length.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
[[Has type::URL]] [[Has description::Used for the most common kinds of URLs, URNs, and URIs. It accepts almost any string and interprets it as a URL.]] [[Category:Lorem ipsum]]
[[Has type::URL]] [[Imported from::foaf:homepage]] [[Has description::URL of the homepage of something, which is a general web resource to learn more about a topic.]] [[Category:Foaf]]
[[Has type::Page]] [[Imported from::foaf:knows]] [[Has description::A property to describe relationship between one a Person to another that he or she knows.]] [[Category:Foaf]]
[[Has type::Text]] [[Imported from::foaf:name]] [[Has description::Name for some thing]][[Category:Foaf]]

'''Berlin''' is the capital of [[Capital of::Germany]] and also its largest city. It is now home to [[Has population::3,520,061]] (as of [[Has date::July 31, 2012]]). The average rainfall is [[Has average rainy days::106.3]] days per year. This city measures [[Has area::891.85 km²]] and has the coordinates [[Has coordinates::52°31'N, 13°24'E]]. It is located in the north of [[located in::Germany]].
[[Category:City]] [[Category:Sample pages]] __SHOWFACTBOX__

'''London''' is the capital city of [[Capital of::England]] and of the [[Capital of::United Kingdom]]. It is located in [[Located in::England]]. As of [[Year::2010]], the total resident population of London was estimated [[Has population::7,825,200]]. Greater London covers an area of [[Has area::1,706.80 km²]] and has the coordinates [[Has coordinates::51.5073346, -0.12768310000001293]]. It rains on [[Has average rainy days::145]] days per year on average.
[[Category:City]] [[Category:Sample pages]] __SHOWFACTBOX__

[[Has text::Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetuer justo Nam quis lobortis vel. Sapien nulla enim Lorem enim pede lorem nulla justo diam wisi. Libero Nam turpis neque leo scelerisque nec habitasse a lacus mattis. Accumsan tincidunt Sed adipiscing nec facilisis tortor Nunc Sed ipsum tellus.]] [[Has page::Turpis pellentesque]] id sociis pede ipsum Quisque. Eu sed sed porta Integer pulvinar accumsan leo in semper lobortis. Urna vel mattis [[Has page::Pellentesque ante]] iaculis tincidunt et consequat Aliquam dictum.
* Has page: [[Has page::{{PAGENAME}}]] * Has number: [[Has number::1001]] * Has area: [[Has area::10.25 km²]] * Has date: [[Has date::1 Jan 2014]] * Has Url: [[Has Url::http://loremipsum.org/]] * Has annotation uri: [[Has annotation uri::http://loremipsum.org/foaf.rdf]] * Has email: [[Has email::Lorem@ipsum.org]] * Has temperature: [[Has temperature::100 °C]] * Has wattage: [[Has wattage::9001]], [[Has wattage::9002 W]], [[Has wattage::10 kW]] * Has telephone number: [[Has telephone number::+1-201-555-0123]] * Has record: [[Has record::Lorem ipsum; closed]] * Has status: [[Has status::open]] * Has boolean: [[Has boolean::true]]
{{#subobject: |Has page={{PAGENAME}} |Has number=1111 |Has area=25 sqmi |Has date=January 4, 2010 7:00 pm |Has Url=http://example.org/some/ |Has annotation uri=http://example.org/foaf.rdf |Has email=Lorem@example.org |Has temperature=100 °F |Has wattage=42 |Has wattage=42 hp |Has telephone number=+1-201-555-5555 |Has record=Lorem enim; closed |Has status=closed |Has boolean=false }}
[[Category:Lorem ipsum]] [[Category:Sample pages]] __SHOWFACTBOX__

[[foaf:name::John Doe]] has the homepage [[foaf:homepage::http://jondoe.example.org]]. His best friend is [[foaf:knows::Jane Doe]]. [[Has annotation uri::http://jondoe.example.org/foaf.rdf]]
[[Special:ExportRDF/John Doe|RDF Export]]
[[Category:Person]] [[Category:Foaf]] __SHOWFACTBOX__

{{#subobject:
 |Has area=891.85 km²;64 sqmi;67 sqmi|+sep=;
 |Has area=89 m²
 |Has wattage=12+33 hp+450 W+15 kW|+sep=+
 |Has wattage=56 hp|20 W|35 kW
}}
{{#subobject: |Has area=891.85 km²;64 sqmi;67 sqmi|+sep=; |Has area=89 m² |Has wattage=12+33 hp+450 W+15 kW|+sep=+ |Has wattage=56 hp|20 W|35 kW }} == Example query == 
{{#ask: [[Has subobject::+]] [[Has area::+]] OR [[Has wattage::+]]
 |?Has area
 |?Has wattage
 |format=broadtable
 |transpose=true
}}
{{#ask: [[Has subobject::+]] [[Has area::+]] OR [[Has wattage::+]] |?Has area |?Has wattage |format=broadtable |transpose=true }} [[Category:Sample pages]]

{{#set_recurring_event:some
 |property=has date
 |Has page=Recurring events
 |Has text=Simple recurring events text
 |start=June 8, 2010
 |unit=day
 |period=1
 |limit=10
 |duration=7200
 |include=March 16, 2010;March 23, 2010|+sep=;
 |exclude=March 15, 2010;March 22, 2010|+sep=;
}}
{{#set_recurring_event:some |property=has date |Has page=Recurring events |Has text=Simple recurring events text |start=June 8, 2010 |unit=day |period=1 |limit=10 |duration=7200 |include=March 16, 2010;March 23, 2010|+sep=; |exclude=March 15, 2010;March 22, 2010|+sep=; }} == Example query == 
{{#ask: [[Has page::Recurring events]]
 |?Has date
 |limit=5
 |format=broadtable
}}
{{#ask: [[Has page::Recurring events]] |?Has date |limit=5 |format=broadtable }} In case the format=eventcalendar is available then the results will be as displayed as calendar otherwise a simple table is used. 
{{#ask: [[Has page::Recurring events]]
 |?Has text
 |?Has date
 |limit=5
 |format=eventcalendar
 |start=latest
}}
{{#ask: [[Has page::Recurring events]] |?Has text |?Has date |limit=5 |format=eventcalendar |start=latest }} [[Category:Sample pages]]
